text: Biała () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Chojnów, within Legnica County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. Prior to 1945 it was in Germany. It lies approximately north of Chojnów, north-west of Legnica, and west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has an approximate population of 650. ==References== Category:Villages in Legnica County
title: Biała, Legnica County
